Male Urogenital Diseases/Urologic Diseases/Urinary Bladder Diseases/Vesico-Ureteral Reflux
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: Retrograde flow of urine from the URINARY BLADDER into the URETER. This is often due to incompetence of the vesicoureteral valve leading to ascending bacterial infection into the KIDNEY.
